title: System Configuration Recommendation
description:
### This Scenario demonstrates configuring FortiSOAR based on your system details. 
Based on your system details, we suggest configuration changes for following 

1. PostgreSQL
2. NGNIX
3. UWSGI
4. Celery-D 

You can find all the recommendations in the attachment section inside FortiSOAR. 

* * *
### How to use this SP 

1. Install SSH Connector 
2. Configure the above Connector for FortiSOAR VM
3. And Simulate "System Configuration Recommendation" scenario
4. After playbook's successful run you will get a Attachment Created by name "Recommended_System_Configuration_<<TR_TIMESTAMP>>.html"
5. Apply the configurations as instructed in Recommended_System_Configuration_<<TR_TIMESTAMP>> report

***

### Note 

1. Make sure to install SSH connector and Configure it 
2. Some configuration only applies to system having SSD as storage
3. One Task is also Created for **csadmin** user
